body: IT'S usually easy to distinguish between clothes and costumes: either you're Spider-Man, or you're not. Drawing the line between polish and pretension is trickier, especially when last year's costume can be this year's classic, and next year's yawn. Just consider the steady infiltration of 19th-century haberdashery into the 21st-century wardrobe.
